header.title: Welcome to vital nutrition
header.text: Health and vitality for the whole family

vitalox.title: Vitalox
vitalox.text: The path to healthy skin is different for everyone. No matter what social media shows you, it takes commitment to your routine, even in the face of set backs. We're here to make sure you stay the course with the right experts and products for you.

story.title: Supplements you can trust
story.text: Our line of supplements and vitamins consists of wellness and life style products that cover various areas such as Cardiovascular, Digestive, Brain & Neuro, Beauty & Skin Health, Bone & Joint Support and Immune support.

news.title: Latest News

newsInfo.title: Launching soon in Egypt
newsInfo.text: PharmaVital, as a part of its geographic expansion will be available soon in the Egyptian market with few of its distinguished food supplement products. The Egyptian market is very welcoming for high quality products that are furnished by PharmaVital as German products.
